name: narrativeMessageTypeCode
description:
01 = Message Rejected
	02 = Message Accepted
	03 = Message Accepted with Warning(s)
	04 = Message Referred to Human Review
	11 = Record Rejected
	13 = Record Accepted with a Warning

name: narrativeMessageIdentifier
description: A code identifying the narrative message.

name: narrativeMessage
description: A narrative message indicating the acceptance or rejection of the input data.

name: envelopeNumber
description: Envelope Number with the accepted FDA transaction
